website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for you if you are nursing twins - it's well made and practical for your needs.
pros: Provides six positioning options in one pillow, and exceptional support
cons: It's costly and a bit heavy, but it's still the best option if you want to nurse twins at the same time

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for twins!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have for twins. Within 5 minutes of receiving the pillow in the mail the boys were sleeping for the first time without being held. They slept for 2 hours the first time in the pillow!! It’s a life saver to any parent with twins.
customer_reviews.author: Gjl243

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing pillow for twins . At first I use it to breast feed my twins , I even took it to the hospital. I use it to Bottle feed both babies at the same time. To take them pictures together. Nice to help both have belly time as well to strengthen neck . It’s a must haves if you have twins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must for twin mommas!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchased ever!!!! I use it everyday with my babies ... not necessarily for breast feeding but for propping during bottle feeding at the same time! Absolutely love and a must for twin mommas!
customer_reviews.author: Nelbelles

customer_reviews.title: She loved it for the twins!
customer_reviews.text: The mother of twins loves this product! It will test your patience on getting the outer shell on and off but it's because of the weird design, but it's the design that makes it work so you can't complain really!
customer_reviews.author: Candace C.

customer_reviews.title: Must have with twins
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday! The only way I can bottle feed the twins at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twin Mom must have!
customer_reviews.text: I use this EVERY DAY with my twins. It’s my #1 twin mama favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: A must have to twins! The only thing is that I have to put pillows underneath when breastfeeding them both.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chen

customer_reviews.title: Best twin pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the beds pillow if you have twins! And not even if you are breast feeding just to set them in it’s that best!
customer_reviews.author: Nixxievazquez

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a baby shower gift. Came very fast and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Annika Chadick

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: It works for my twins in more ways than one.
customer_reviews.author: ASEK

product_meta.title: Twin Z PIllow + Light Green Cover + Free Travel Bag
product_meta.description: The New 6 in 1 Twin Support and Feeding Pillow! A MUST HAVE FOR NEW TWIN PARENTS! Great back support for mom and babies! Great for close bonding time with mom and babies! A mom of multiples must have!!
feature_bullets: As seen on ABC's Show SHARK TANK- The Twin Z Pillow!
The New 6 in 1 Twin Support and Feeding Pillow!
Amazing back support for nursing 2 babies at one time! A true must have for parents of Multiples!!
For embroidery customization see our website!

specifications.Safety warning: Warning: Never allow a baby to sleep on the support pillow. Pillow may be a possible suffocation hazard. Please do not use in cribs, bassinets, playpens or beds. There should always be an adult present when the pillow is in use. Please do not leave baby unattended. Improper use of this product could result in serious injury or death.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
